title: Feature Store Architecture for Real-Time ML Trading Pipelines
author: K1
summary: A Feature Store is a critical MLOps component for ML-based trading bots, ensuring consistent, reusable, and real-time features. Learn how we built a hybrid online-offline feature store at 1DES using Faust and PostgreSQL.
seo_title: Feature Store for Real-Time ML Trading: Architecture, Benefits & 1DES Implementation
seo_description: Feature Stores power real-time ML trading. See how 1DES uses Faust and PostgreSQL to manage features and streamline online and offline trading pipelines.
seo_keywords: feature store ML trading, real-time feature store, MLOps trading bots, Faust feature store Python, PostgreSQL feature store, algorithmic trading ML features
